description: This file defines API routes for product-related operations in an e-commerce backend, utilizing Express.js. It includes route handlers for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting products, with middleware for authentication, authorization, and request validation, as well as Swagger documentation annotations.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles listing of products with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination.

methods.name: detail
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information of a product by ID or slug.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new product, protected by admin authentication and request body validation.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing product by ID, protected by admin authentication.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes a product by ID, protected by admin authentication.
